ComicInfo.Summary: "Can we put the tape on now?: Two more agents of Cardinal Montague join the search for Nicholas Dane. The Representative of "the balance" informs Nicholas that each of the people on the plane that dies gave their lives, energies, hopes and dreams, and talents to him so that he might live. They also gave hime their unfinished business that he must complete. The next unfinished business that he must complete involves Victoria Small and Sonny Pennucci.
ComicInfo.Title: "Can we put the tape on now?
ComicInfo.Characters: Representative of "the balance" (lady with long yellow hair),Cardinal Montague,Agent Payne (first appearance),Agent Abel (first appearance),Nelson (first appearance),Barbara Clifford (dies),David Krause,Agent Biederman,Matthew (first appearance),Donna (first appearance,Nicholas Dane,Ruth Farmer (first appearance),Robert "Cliff" Clifford,Sonny Pennucci (first appearance),Agent Bogart,Victoria Small (first appearance),dies)
